attrib.italic: The data are presented as means ± standard deviations. Values in bold are statistically significant.

PTA, pure tone average; SRT, speech reception threshold; PC, presbycusis; NH, normal hearing controls; MoCA, Montreal Cognitive Assessment; AVLT, Auditory Verbal Learning Test; SDMT, Symbol Digit Modalities Test; TMT, Trail-Making Test; levels of anxiety and depression were assessed according to the Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale (HADS).
